name: Donna Bozeman
text: I absolutely enjoyed the experience. The teacher was fun however very informative. I wish they would separate the Beginners. I have never bartended before and I left there with tons of knowledge. Thank you TRACEY

name: Jamie Oliver
text: ABC Bartending School is a student friendly school and very affordable. The process to registering was easy and I have no complaints. The instructor is very knowledgeable and work with students to ensure that understand the concept. Instructor was very helpful, made sure she answered all my questions and made sure I understood. I recommend this company for your Bartending license.

name: Evan Gove
text: The class was fun and energetic. Our instructor, Tracey is very knowledgeable and entertaining. The location was not the best. Poor lighting (only one light works as of 07/27/2021), building is worn down and not well kept, bathrooms never had toilet paper or paper towels, etc. Overall the classes were initially a little crowded, but I would still say the class was a good foundational bartending class.

name: Jamie Bonner
text: Alabama Bartending school was helpful and professional. The staff work well with you especially when you weren’t able to make a class due to sudden events.

name: Raheen Shields
text: This learning experience was awesome. The instructor was very knowledgeable and informative. She also made sure I was secure in all areas. The hands on experience was the best! I’d recommend anyone to Alabama Bartending School. Thanks for the learning experience.

name: Dalexis Hayes
text: My experience with Traci was excellent! The booklet has everything you need to know in it! I had so much fun learning, and everything is hands on. Don’t be afraid to ask questions!

name: Cecilia Curry
text: Great training! Tracy, our instructor, provided us both practical and real-life bartending knowledge that will benefit us as future licensed bartenders. She made it easy to grasp and understand. I would recommend this class!

name: Whitney Nix
text: The teacher is fun smart she knows her stuff and will help you with anything and everything you need help with! She always contacts me back very fast and is just an all around amazing teacher!

name: Lila Bowman
text: This class is a complete joke! Don’t waste your money. You can get this online for $12 throw Groupon

name: Anyiah Northard
text: My class was very informative and fun. She made sure we had the basics down and will make sure you pass your test!

name: Kayla McKnight
text: Ms. Ellis was extremely passionate about teaching us! Always going above and beyond to make sure we got the lesson that was taught on that day! She makes it so fun and easy to remember things! I took the weekend class because I work Monday- Friday. I didn’t mind waking up early on a Saturday because I knew once I arrived, I would be greeted with a warm smile and positive energy! Ms. Ellis is such a great person and instructor and you definitely get your money’s worth taking this course! Sign up you won’t regret it!

name: Kasmyn Wilder
text: I learned a lot. Enjoyed hands on activities. You will enjoy your experience I enjoyed mine.

name: Heather Hunter
text: This class was so much fun and I learned alot! They teach you all of the ins and outs of bartending and preps you for the exam!

name: Garett Rodgers
text: This "school" requires you to leave a 5 star review in order to receive the"certificate" that you've already paid for.. also don't be fooled by the job placement ad on their site it is complete fraudulent advertising, as what they actually do for you is take a screenshot of positions open on Google and email it to you. Tracey the instructor is also a scam artist. She will teach nothing, you copy things down from an answer key then take the test at home sending her a picture when completed

name: Nyah Garrett
text: The teacher was great. Everything was simple and straight to the point. If we had any questions she answered all of them. She made class fun. She give you all the tools you need to pass the test. I would recommend anyone to go through abc bartenders school.

name: Kathleen Alexander
text: Loved every minute. Awesome teacher that made it fun. Thanks Tracy

name: Summer S
text: Very enjoyable experience in the class, she's helpful with tips to help you remember and understanding! I would recommend it to friends thinking of joining the field

name: Pinke Jones
text: This class was EVERYTHING ‼️‼️‼️Tracy is the dopest instructor and didn’t  mind informing the class of all the tips and tricks of the trade. I am throughly satisfied with everything I obtained while attending class😁😁😁. I now have a skill that I can use and profit from. THANK YOU ABC BARTENDING SCHOOL‼️‼️‼️

name: Abigail Chappell
text: Teacher was great, class was also amazing! Very helpful and fun! 10/10 recommended. 😌

name: CHRISHAWNA MARIE WOODS
text: Thank You So Much I Had So Much Fun The Instructor Tracey Was The Best And Very Helpful I Loved The Class And Had Fun With Her

name: Sheneavian Marshall
text: This class is everything I learned a lot and the teacher was excellent. You’ll definitely enjoy!

name: Taylor Gee
text: Tracey is an AMAZING teacher! I would take this class all over again if needed, I had an awesome time (:

name: Jalesa Latham
text: This was a very upbeat class. The instructor was head on with the important information. She made sure everyone had the correct materials. She also engaged well with the class. I would definitely recommend.

name: Mel Hicks
text: This program is a must. It definitely gives you the knowledge needed to get start in this profession. I have never done bartending  before and was nervous I wouldn’t catch on but the instructor made everything easy to learn with fun slogans and ways to remember. I would recommend this class to anyone. The hands on training made me feel ready for the bartending world.

name: Athaliah Norris
text: I truly enjoyed taking bartending classes with the Bartending School of Birmingham!  It was very exciting and informative. Starting off I knew nothing of bartending, now I feel like a pro, ready to get out into the real world of bar tendering. The instructor was very nice and professional captivating and positive. I would recommend anyone who is interested in bartending to  attend this school! It has always been my dream to be a bartender and now my dreams have come true!

name: Tiara Bell
text: Alabama Bartending School is an amazing journey to obtain your bartending license. I had the honor of being a student of Traycie’s and I can not even began to express how welcoming and wonderful she is! I will definitely be back if I ever need a refresher course or just to stop by and see Traycie to show her all my new tricks put to work. <3

name: Brittney Moody
text:
Let me tell y’all about the Bartending School
In Birmingham,AL. The instructor from the first day of class was very inviting! She made you feel good about yourself and the knowledge wether you knew nothing about Bartending or have been doing it for years. We got to make drinks well not with real liquor but you get my drift. It had a real life bar setting and was set up just as if you were in a major chain of restaurants Bartending. She let you make as many drinks in front of the class until you were comfortable. I volunteered to be first. LOL  I absolutely Loved the class and the instructor. I would definitely take this course again for any refreshing needed!

name: walter kirksey
text: Had a great time in the class and learned a lot!!! Traci was awesome!!!

name: Brandon Woodard
text: I enjoyed my week long class at the end of November. It was taught by very experienced bartenders and I learned a lot more than I expected to. I didn’t just learn drinks, I learned how to be a good bartender. I would recommend for people to take this class.

name: Tristan Leach
text: I signed up the the class in Birmingham, AL.  Tracey Ellis was a wonderful teacher.  I took this class for a potential part time job and did not know anything about alcohol.  I will continue to recommend this school.  I can't wait to start bartending as a hobby.

name: Tirrell Davis
text: The experience of the class was good worth the time and money. Also Ms Tracey is an awesome instructor!

name: Tracy McCall
text: Tracey Ellis is by far a phenomenal instructor. She is very patient and able to articulate her student's strengths and weaknesses when facilitating and practicing the proper way to measure liquids. Her personality was the perfect fit to keep the class interesting which enabled me to relax and address more complex questions that I had pertaining to the course. Being a newbie in this field, she was very motivating and resourceful in ways which made me feel more comfortable as I pursue this journey. Thank you Ms. Ellis for challenging my knowledge in becoming a bartender.

name: Jahneia Sims
text: I really enjoyed  myself .My teacher Tracy made the class very interesting.  She was always making jokes. I wish we had on the job training and  made a drink with real alcohol on our last day. Over all it was a great class.

name: Carolline Martin
text: The material that was required of us to know was current and emphasized in the industry of bartending in its current economic state. My instructor was very enthusiastic about her job and that contributed tremendously to the learning environment.

name: Susan Floyd
text: Great experience! I loved the teacher and enjoyed the classes.

name: Erica Paul
text: Really great experience! I would highly recommend it to anyone interested in entering the bartending world.

name: kenya brown
text: The course was very informative ! I loved the hands on and how detailed the instructor Tracy is on teaching all the fundamentals of bartending . I’d highly recommend all to take course !

name: mi mi
text: Easy Class, instructor was great. Definitely would recommend.

name: knmccrary
text: Our instructor Tracey Ellis was awesome. I learned so much from her. She was very engaging. I would recommend this course to any & everyone! I will be back for refresher courses.

name: Carla Johnson
text: Tracey is a fun, amazing, positive teacher. You get out what you put in. Don’t be afraid to ask her to stay behind and practice or ask questions. I recommend you also research on your own time as well! Learn the history behind the drinks and flavors.  She was very patient and willing to teach you which I think is rare. I’m actually going to start applying to places by first visiting a few spots this week to get an idea of the atmosphere! Don’t be afraid! Do I think I am ready: honestly yes! Because I studied and practiced.

name: Sharon Dennis
text: I really enjoyed the class. Tracey was so much fun and informative. As many drinks as it is to learn that can be a little intimidating but Tracey made sure the class wasn't boring so for me it made learning the drinks pretty easy. I learn better hands on and I loved that if I wanted to practice extra drinks she had no problem letting me do it. I would definitely recommend this bartending school!

name: Catherine Rich
text: I would definitely recommend. My teacher was amazing. Very helpful and understanding. She makes the learning process really fun. If you've been interested in learning to mix drinks, sign up!!! It doesn't take long, they have multiple class times/days to make it easier to attend. Go get yourself certified too

name: Veronica King - Knight
text: I truly enjoyed this class the instructor made it fun and exciting which made it easy to learn. I'll definitely be referring this class to others.

name: Timmie Kirksey
text: REALLY INSIGHTFUL....INSTRUCTOR IS REALLY FRIENDLY DEFINITELY KNOWS HER STUFF AND IF U TAKE THE CLASS U WILL 2.......SO WORTH THE MONEY TO BE CERTIFIED. DEFINITELY A STEAL AND A MUST

name: Javei Harvey
text: Great Experience!!!! Tracey Ellis was a excellent instructor with a refreshing sense of humor. She truly cares about her students and will make sure you learn everything you need!

name: mssanders87
text: I had a great time in class! Tracey was amazing, fun, professional and very thorough. I will definitely go back to refresh my memory occasionally and just to say "Hi"!

name: alicia bradford
text:
great experience, lots of knowledge & the fact that you’re done in just 4 DAYS is awesome! Ms. Tracey is the funniest & that makes the experience even more fun!

thanks for everything!

text:
Good, knowledgeable teacher
Great class flexibility
Highly informative

I had the best experience at Alabama Bartending School. Tracey was an awesome instructor. She made the process run smoothly, and she made it fun.
I would highly recommend this school.

name: Kaylyn Clausell
text: Tracy was a great teacher, great energy through out entire training process. Thanks, I enjoyed my 2 weeks!

name: Eric Slaughter
text:
I came into this class without any knowledge of bartending. Now I know a few drinks and techniques.

The pros: Tracey, the instructor, made this class fun. With her outspoken personality and no filter there was never a dull moment. She was knowledgeable and could answer questions nearly right off the back.

The cons: the class was scheduled from 6-9, but there were times the class was ended only 30 min into it. For the money I paid I would’ve rather the instructor took time to teach us the details. However, class was mostly just reading the textbook word for word. Also, there were different class groups on different sections in the textbook that the instructor had to teach all at once. Never giving her time to really focus with one group of students. I feel the class was rushed and spotty. Really ended up teaching myself. An online class would’ve been better than having to drive an hour in rush hour traffic for a 30 min to an hour class.

Overall: I wanted to obtain a new skill, I’m sure I’ll learn loads more on the job. This class was simply to obtain the mixologist certification.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. I reached out to others in the same class and stated they stayed for the full duration of class. We will reach out directly to you so you can come back for extra classes to practice. Thanks!

name: The Healing Spoon
text: This was by far the best ecpexperie I've ever had! Tracey Ellis was my instructor and she was nothing short of amazing! She really knew how to keep our attention.

name: ERICA MICHELLE CLAYTON
text: I had a overall wonderful experience, being that I am already a bartender it was beneficial to learn more about bartending and legal terms Ms. Tina is an awesome instructor so takes her time to ensure you understand the material. Going forward through I think the program should be more hands on ex: how could a doctor perform a surgery without proper hands on experience? Yeah sure He can tell you from the textbook but he wouldn’t be able to demonstrate what he learned if someone didn’t physically show him first just saying I know how difficult it can be behind the bar and when you pressured you got to know what you know if not you will mess up a lot of drinks and lose a lot of money because someone has to pay for the mistakes.... I love the class though I will recommend this class to my co-workers..

resp.text: Thanks.

name: Magan Moore
text: I WENT HERE IN DECEMBER AND THE INSTRUCTOR WAS VERY THOROUGH WITH HOW SHE TAUGHT THR CLASS. SHE TOOK HER TIME TO ANSWER ANY QUESTIONS, TO MAKE SURE WE HAD WHAT WE NEEDED FOR THE TEST, AND SHE MADE SURE WE WENT OVER OUR DRINKS. I LOVED PRACTICING WITH THE DRINKS I JIST WISH THEY HAD REAL ALCOHOL SO THAT WE WOULD BE ABLE TO TASTE THE DRINKS TO MAKE SURE THEY DONE RIGHT!! ITS QUICK AND ITS FUN!!!!

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed it! CHEERS

text:
DONT TRUST THIS... The class is illegitimate & if you request a refund when you are dissatisfied, they will refer you to a false email, ignore your future calls, & you’ll be forced to contact your bank to receive a refund.

The school is physically a real place, but it’s a joke. Your money will absolutely be better spent elsewhere!

name: Airelle S Peters
text:
SCAM
This is a scam!!!! Please do not call this place! Soon as they get your credit card info you will lose contact with them and they will disappear. I had to withdraw from the class for family reasons two before my money was supposed to be withdrawn from my account and for those weeks I couldn't get anyone on the phone.They took my money put my account without my permission. They saw that my account didn't have a tuition amount so they still took whatever they could. Then had the nerve to send saying I still owed them money for the class BUT they took  $100 out of my account for it. Once I messaged them back that I didn't authorize that transaction they fell silent again. No one answering the phone or emails. Please others BEWARE!!!

name: Michael Todd
text:
Likes to steal your money, crooked people, paid for school and never got any classes, owner himself has been in jail for scamming people once before, fake school, and owner is crooked, what more could you want.
The reviews you see are actual people that work and have been teachers there, want a real school and actual bar, go to a bar or go to New York they will teach you professionally, This school likes to just steal your credit card info and your money, it's a SCAM and so is the OWNERS

resp.text: Sore loser competitor who's other fake reviews keep getting deleted by google so they write new ones. Harassment at it's finest.

name: s t
text:
I was looking for an informative class regarding bar tending, something I could do on the side. My initial concern was the length of the class in comparison to others companies that offered training. I was assured that this class provided the same information but in half the time, i.e. not a lot of fluff just to charge the student more money.
After completing this class, I have determined that my experience was a really positive one. My instructor was very knowledgeable about her field, she had real life experiences to offer and was very patient. I would recommend this class to anyone looking to complete a course on the in's and out's of bar tending and not having to spend a lot of money to do so. The opportunity for help with job placement is a plus too! I may not get hired into a bartender position right away, but at least I will have the tools in place to work towards that goal. Thank you!!!

resp.text: We think you'll be able to start off bartending immediately, especially with your great attitude! Thanks for the feedback! CHEERS!
